alert.note: Alert for Comal; Hays (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hays, north central Bexar and Comal Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Timberwood Park, or 10 miles northwest of Selma, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Wimberley, Canyon Lake Dam, Canyon Lake, Bulverde, Garden Ridge, Smithson Valley, Timberwood Park, Fischer, Spring Branch, Startzville, Sattler and Anhalt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Texas.
